property.name: UserName
property.data_display_description: The user chosen name or nickname. The user will be identified by this name throughout the application.

property.name: PasswordHash
property.data_display_description: The salted hash of the user's password.

property.name: AccessToken
property.data_display_description: The user's private key

property.name: ExternalScreenName
property.data_display_description: The user's public key.

delete.name: dissaciate_User_with_Role
delete.body: DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = @{prop:userId.Id} AND role_id = @{prop:roleId.Id};

property.name: TalkNumber
property.data_display_description: The talk number

property.name: Title
property.data_display_description: The talk title or theme

property.name: CreatedOn
property.data_display_description: The date and time the talk was added into the system.

property.name: CreatedBy
property.data_display_description: The name of the user who added the talk to the system.

property.name: ModifiedOn
property.data_display_description: The date and time the talk was modified.

property.name: ModifiedBy
property.data_display_description: The name of the user who modified the talk.

property.name: CongregationName
property.data_display_description: The name of the congregation.

property.name: StreetAddress
property.data_display_description: The street name

property.name: StreetAddress2
property.data_display_description: Extra information relating the street name or address

property.name: City
property.data_display_description: The name of the city

property.name: Province
property.data_display_description: The province or state name

property.name: PostalCode
property.data_display_description: The postal code or zip code

property.name: MeetingTime
property.data_display_description: Day of the week and time when the meeting is held.

property.name: CreatedOn
property.data_display_description: Date and time when the record was created.

property.name: CreatedBy
property.data_display_description: The name of the user who created the record

property.name: ModifiedOn
property.data_display_description: The date and time when the record was modified

property.name: ModifiedBy
property.data_display_description: The user who last modified the record.

property.name: FirstName
property.data_display_description: The contact's first or given name.

property.name: LastName
property.data_display_description: The last name or surname.

property.name: EmailAddress
property.data_display_description: The email address

property.name: CreatedOn
property.data_display_description: The date and time when the record was added

property.name: CreatedBy
property.data_display_description: The name of user who added the record.

property.name: ModifiedOn
property.data_display_description: The date and time when the record was modified.

property.name: ModifiedBy
property.data_display_description: The name of the user who modified the record

property.name: PrivilegeType
property.data_display_description: The Privileges type. Eg. Elder, Ministerial Servant, etc.

delete.name: dissaciate_Contact_with_Language
delete.body: DELETE FROM speaker_languages WHERE language_id = @{prop:languageId.Id} AND contact_id = @{prop:contactId.Id};

entity.name: ScheduledMeeting
entity.data_display_description: Entity to represent a scheduled meeting.

property.name: WeekNumber
property.data_display_description: The week number

property.name: MeetingTime
property.data_display_description: The calendar date and time of the scheduled meeting.

property.name: Hospitality
property.data_display_description: The person or group responsible for hospitality.

reference.name: Pres
reference.data_display_description: The brother who's presiding over the meeting.

entity.name: Role
entity.data_display_description: Application role used for security and permissions.

property.name: RoleNumber
property.data_display_description: The role number

property.name: Name
property.data_display_description: The name of the role.

property.name: Description
property.data_display_description: A short description of the role.

delete.name: dissaciate_Role_with_User
delete.body: DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = @{prop:userId.Id} AND role_id = @{prop:roleId.Id};

delete.name: dissaciate_Language_with_Contact
delete.body: DELETE FROM speaker_languages WHERE language_id = @{prop:languageId.Id} AND contact_id = @{prop:contactId.Id};

property.name: AssignmentType
property.data_display_description: The type of assignment such as President, WatchTower reader, etc

property.name: AssignedOn
property.data_display_description: The date and time when the talk was assigned.

reference.name: Contact
reference.data_display_description: Brother who's been assigned the talk.

property.name: KeyName
property.data_display_description: Config key name: key name must be unique.

property.name: KeyValue
property.data_display_description: Config key value

property.name: CreatedOn
property.data_display_description: Date and time when setting was created.

property.name: ModifiedOn
property.data_display_description: Date and time setting was last modified.

query.name: GetUserRoles
query.body: select r.id "Id", r.role_number "RoleNumber", r.role_name "Name" from roles r inner join user_roles ur on ur.role_id = r.id and ur.user_id = @userId

query.name: GetAllUsersInRole
query.body: select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by ua.user_name ) AS RowNumber, ua.id "Id", ua.user_name "UserName", ua.is_active "IsActive", c.email_address "EmailAddress", c.first_name "FirstName", c.last_name "LastName" from user_accounts ua left join user_roles ur on ur.user_id = ua.id inner join roles r on r.id = ur.role_id inner join contacts c on c.id = ua.contact_id where r.id = @roleId ) c where RowNumber >= @offset and RowNumber < (@limit + @offset)

statement.name: GetUserInRoleCount
statement.body: select count(ua.id) from user_accounts ua left join user_roles ur on ur.user_id = ua.id inner join roles r on r.id = ur.role_id where r.id = @{roleId}

query.name: GetAllUsers
query.body: select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by ua.user_name ) AS RowNumber, ua.id "Id", ua.user_name "UserName", ua.is_active "IsActive", c.email_address "EmailAddress", c.first_name "FirstName", c.last_name "LastName" from user_accounts ua inner join contacts c on c.id = ua.contact_id ) c where RowNumber >= @offset and RowNumber < (@limit + @offset)
